original_title: The Legend of the Bermuda Triangle
overview: The Bermuda Triangle is as triangular region of the North Atlantic ocean said to be abnormally prone to nautical vanishments. LEMMiNO explores plausible explanations for some of these vanishments while demonstrating how the legend was merely invented by authors of fiction.
tagline: The Bermuda Triangle is, and has always been, a mystery for mysteries sake. The very definition of a legend.
title: The Legend of the Bermuda Triangle
